furniture.Catalog.name: Happy Home Catalogue
crafting.HappyHomeDesigner/Catalog.name: Happy Home Catalogue
config.CloseWithKey.name: Close With Key
config.CloseWithKey.desc: Allow the menu to be closed with the menu close keys
config.GiveModifier.name: Give Modifier
config.GiveModifier.desc: Holding this key when clicking will put the item in your inventory
config.FavoriteModifier.name: Favorite Modifier
config.FavoriteModifier.desc: Holding this key when clicking will favorite or unfavorite the item
config.ExtendedCategories.name: Extended Categories
config.ExtendedCategories.desc: While enabled, replaces the default furniture filter tabs with more granular filters
config.FurnitureTooltips.name: Furniture Tooltips
config.FurnitureTOoltips.desc: While enabled, displays tooltips for hovered items in the furniture catalog
